hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Amr ibn al-'As: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: Allah , the Exalted, hates the eloquent one among men who moves his tongue round (among his teeth), as cattle do

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُتَشَدِّقِ فِي الْكَلاَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been narrated about eloquent speech
